price: Naye hakika bila ya shaka ana nguvu za kupenda mali!
footnotes: Na hakika yeye kwa uchoyo na kuyapenda mali alio nayo, ni bakhili, hatoi kama inavyo mwajibikia katika mali yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
